verses.verse: And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all his <S%H2428>host<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%>; and there were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H5483>him<s%>, and horses and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>: and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and fought against <S%H3898>it<s%>.
